archimate:ApplicationFunction.name: Resource Task Item Sequence Carry Through
archimate:ApplicationFunction.documentation: Resource Task Item Sequence Carry Through: Because of the �Resource Task Item Decomposition� of an orchestration request the result may be several actions that needs to take place in a specific sequence. The �Resource Task Item Sequence Carry Through� function executes each individual item in sequence to fulfill, or roll back according to a pre-defined configuration, and reports the sequence carry through result.
